com.team4.s4b.domain
[Groovy] Class BribeContract

java.lang.Object
  com.team4.s4b.domain.BribeContract

@ToString
@EqualsAndHashCode
class BribeContract

Represents the relationship of the Opportunity and Bribe/BribePortfolio to a Benefactor and Recipient.

Property Summary
static java.lang.Object belongsTo

Bribe bribe

The bribe associated with the contract.

BribePortfolio bribePortfolio

The bribe portfolio linked to this contract as the bribe may be shaken for on a later date.
java.lang.Boolean bribeStatus

Boolean indicating whether the bribe has been fulfilled of not for this contract.

static java.lang.Object constraints

static java.lang.Object embedded

Opportunity opportunity

The opportunity linked to this contract.
java.lang.Boolean opportunityStatus

Boolean indicating whether the opportunity has been fulfilled of not for this contract.

Property Detail

belongsTo

static java.lang.Object belongsTo

bribe

Bribe bribe
The bribe associated with the contract. This data is embedded into the contract and is a copy of the actual bribe.

bribePortfolio

BribePortfolio bribePortfolio
The bribe portfolio linked to this contract as the bribe may be shaken for on a later date.

bribeStatus

java.lang.Boolean bribeStatus
Boolean indicating whether the bribe has been fulfilled of not for this contract. Defaults to false.

The opportunity linked to this contract.

opportunityStatus

java.lang.Boolean opportunityStatus
Boolean indicating whether the opportunity has been fulfilled of not for this contract. Defaults to false.
